15 int initial_md49_mode;
16 int initial_md49_acceleration;

18 bool initial_md49_regulator;
19 int requested_speed_l, requested_speed_r;
20 int actual_speed_l=128, actual_speed_r=128;
27 void cmd_vel_callback(const geometry_msgs::Twist& vel_cmd){
28  // Drive For- or Backward:
29  if (vel_cmd.linear.x != 0){
30  requested_speed_l = 128+(635*vel_cmd.linear.x);
31  requested_speed_r = 128+(635*vel_cmd.linear.x);
32  }
33  // Drive stopped:
34  if (vel_cmd.linear.x==0 && vel_cmd.angular.z==0){
35  requested_speed_l = 128;
36  requested_speed_r = 128;
37  }
38  // Turn clock- or counterclockwise:
39  if (vel_cmd.angular.z != 0){
40  requested_speed_l = 128 - (127*vel_cmd.angular.z);
41  requested_speed_r = 128 + (127*vel_cmd.angular.z);
42  }
43  ROS_INFO("base_controller: Received /cmd_vel message. Requested speed_l=%i, speed_r=%i",requested_speed_l,requested_speed_r);
44 }
45 
49 class md49{
50 public:
60  md49(int speed_l, int speed_r, int mode, int acceleration, bool timeout, bool regulator)
61  {
62  set_speed(speed_l,speed_r);
63  set_mode(mode);
64  set_acceleration(acceleration);
65  if (timeout=true)
66  {
67  enable_timeout();
68  }
69  else if (timeout=false)
70  {
71  disable_timeout();
72  }
73  if (regulator=true)
74  {
75  enable_regulator();
76  }
77  else if (regulator=false)
78  {
79  disable_regulator();
80  }
81  }
87  void set_speed(int speed_l, int speed_r)
88  {
89  // set and send serial command for speed_l
90  const char md49_set_speed_l[]={0x00,0x31,speed_l};
91  device.write(md49_set_speed_l,3);
92  // set and send serial command for speed_r
93  const char md49_set_speed_r[]={0x00,0x32,speed_r};
94  device.write(md49_set_speed_r,3);
95  actual_speed_l=requested_speed_l; actual_speed_r=requested_speed_r;
96  ROS_INFO("base_controller: Set speed_l=%i and speed_r=%i on MD49", requested_speed_l,requested_speed_r);
97  }
102  void set_mode(int mode)
103  {
104  const char md49_set_mode[]={0x00,0x34,mode};
105  device.write(md49_set_mode,3);
106  ROS_INFO("base_controller: Set mode=%i on MD49", mode);
107  }
112  void set_acceleration(int acceleration)
113  {
114  const char md49_set_acceleration[]={0x00,0x33,acceleration};
115  device.write(md49_set_acceleration,3);
116  ROS_INFO("base_controller: Set acceleration=%i on MD49", acceleration);
117  }
121  void enable_timeout(void){
122  const char md49_enable_timeout[] = {0x00,0x39}; // put together command to enable md49 timeout
123  device.write(md49_enable_timeout,2);
124  md49_data.timeout=1;
125  ROS_INFO("base_controller: Enabled timeout on MD49");
126  }
130  void enable_regulator(void){
131  const char md49_enable_regulator[] = {0x00,0x37}; // put together command to enable md49 regulator
132  device.write(md49_enable_regulator,2);
133  md49_data.regulator=1;
134  ROS_INFO("base_controller: Enabled regulator on MD49");
135  }
139  void disable_timeout(void){
140  const char md49_disable_timeout[] = {0x00,0x38}; // put together command to enable md49 regulator
141  device.write(md49_disable_timeout,2);
142  md49_data.timeout=0;
143  ROS_INFO("base_controller: Disabled timeout on MD49");
144  }
148  void disable_regulator(void){
149  const char md49_disable_regulator[] = {0x00,0x36}; // put together command to enable md49 timeout
150  device.write(md49_disable_regulator,2);
151  md49_data.regulator=0;
152  ROS_INFO("base_controller: Disabled regulator on MD49");
153  }
158  int get_acceleration(){
159  const char md49_get_acceleration[] = {0x00,0x2A}; // put together command to read md49 set acceleration
160  device.write(md49_get_acceleration,2);
161  try{ device.read(reply, 1, TIMEOUT); } // get answer, acceleration
162  catch(cereal::TimeoutException& e){
163  ROS_ERROR("base_controller: Timeout reading MD49 acceleration!");
164  }
165  //ROS_INFO("base_controller: MD49 Acceleration= %i", reply[0]);
166  return reply[0];
167  }
172  int get_mode(){
173  const char md49_get_mode[] = {0x00,0x2B}; // put together command to read md49 set acceleration
174  device.write(md49_get_mode,2);
175  try{ device.read(reply, 1, TIMEOUT); } // get answer, acceleration
176  catch(cereal::TimeoutException& e){
177  ROS_ERROR("base_controller: Timeout reading MD49 Mode!");
178  }
179  //ROS_INFO("base_controller: MD49 Mode= %i", reply[0]);
180  return reply[0];
181  }
186  int get_speed_l(){
187  const char md49_get_speed_l[] = {0x00,0x21}; // put together command to read md49 set acceleration
188  device.write(md49_get_speed_l,2);
189  try{ device.read(reply, 1, TIMEOUT); } // get answer, acceleration
190  catch(cereal::TimeoutException& e){
191  ROS_ERROR("base_controller: Timeout reading MD49 speed_l!");
192  }
193  return reply[0];
194  //ROS_INFO("base_controller: MD49 speed_l= %i, speed_r= %i", speed_l,speed_r);
195  }
200  int get_speed_r(){
201  const char md49_get_speed_r[] = {0x00,0x22}; // put together command to read md49 set acceleration
202  device.write(md49_get_speed_r,2);
203  try{ device.read(reply, 1, TIMEOUT); } // get answer, acceleration
204  catch(cereal::TimeoutException& e){
205  ROS_ERROR("base_controller: Timeout reading MD49 speed_r!");
206  }
207  return reply[0];
208  //ROS_INFO("base_controller: MD49 speed_l= %i, speed_r= %i", speed_l,speed_r);
209  }
213  void get_encoders(void){
214  const char md49_get_encoders[] = {0x00,0x25}; // put together command to read md49 encoders
215  device.write(md49_get_encoders,2);
216  // ******************************************************
217  // * Get the reply, the last value is the timeout in ms *
218  // ******************************************************
219  try{ device.read(reply, 8, TIMEOUT); }
220  catch(cereal::TimeoutException& e){
221  ROS_ERROR("base_controller: Timeout reading MD49 encodervalues!");
222  }
223  // ***************************************************
224  // * Set all values of custom message /md49_encoders *
225  // ***************************************************
226  md49_encoders.encoder_l = reply[0] << 24; // put together first encoder value
227  md49_encoders.encoder_l |= (reply[1] << 16);
228  md49_encoders.encoder_l |= (reply[2] << 8);
229  md49_encoders.encoder_l |= (reply[3]);
230  md49_encoders.encoder_r = reply[4] << 24; // put together second encoder value
231  md49_encoders.encoder_r |= (reply[5] << 16);
232  md49_encoders.encoder_r |= (reply[6] << 8);
233  md49_encoders.encoder_r |= (reply[7]);
234  md49_encoders.encoderbyte1l=reply[0];
235  md49_encoders.encoderbyte2l=reply[1];
236  md49_encoders.encoderbyte3l=reply[2];
237  md49_encoders.encoderbyte4l=reply[3];
238  md49_encoders.encoderbyte1r=reply[4];
239  md49_encoders.encoderbyte2r=reply[5];
240  md49_encoders.encoderbyte3r=reply[6];
241  md49_encoders.encoderbyte4r=reply[7];
242  //ROS_INFO("Got this reply: %i,%i,%i,%i,%i,%i,%i,%i", reply[0], reply[1], reply[2],reply[3], reply[4], reply[5], reply[6], reply[7]);
243  }
248  int get_volts(){
249  const char md49_get_volts[] = {0x00,0x26}; // put together command to read md49 volts
250  device.write(md49_get_volts,2);
251  try{ device.read(reply, 1, TIMEOUT); } // get answer, volts
252  catch(cereal::TimeoutException& e){
253  ROS_ERROR("base_controller: Timeout reading MD49 volts!");
254  }
255  //ROS_INFO("Got this reply (volts): %i", reply[0]);
256  return reply[0];
257  }
262  int get_current_l(){
263  const char md49_get_current_l[] = {0x00,0x27}; // put together command to read md49 current_l
264  device.write(md49_get_current_l,2);
265  try{ device.read(reply, 1, TIMEOUT); } // get answer, current_l
266  catch(cereal::TimeoutException& e){
267  ROS_ERROR("base_controller: Timeout reading MD49 current_l!");
268  }
269  //ROS_INFO("Got this reply (current_l): %i", reply[0]);
270  return reply[0];
271  }
276  int get_current_r(){
277  const char md49_get_current_r[] = {0x00,0x28}; // put together command to read md49 current_r
278  device.write(md49_get_current_r,2);
279  try{ device.read(reply, 1, TIMEOUT); } // get answer, current_r
280  catch(cereal::TimeoutException& e){
281  ROS_ERROR("base_controller: Timeout reading MD49 current_r!");
282  }
283  //ROS_INFO("Got this reply (current_r): %i", reply[0]);
284  return reply[0];
285  }
290  int get_error(){
291  // ************************
292  const char md49_get_error[] = {0x00,0x2D}; // put together command to read md49 error
293  device.write(md49_get_error,2);
294  try{ device.read(reply, 1, TIMEOUT); } // get answer, error
295  catch(cereal::TimeoutException& e){
296  ROS_ERROR("base_controller: Timeout reading MD49 errorbyte!");
297  }
298  //ROS_INFO("Got this reply (error): %i", reply[0]);
299  return reply[0];
300  }
304  void reset_encoders(void){
305  const char md49_reset_encoders[] = {0x00,0x35}; // put together command to reset md49 encoders
306  device.write(md49_reset_encoders,2);
307  ROS_INFO("base_controller: Reset encoders on MD49");
308  }
309 };
310 
311 int main( int argc, char* argv[] ){
312  // *****************
313  // * Init ROS node *
314  // *****************
315  ros::init(argc, argv, "base_controller" );
316  ros::NodeHandle n;
317  ros::Subscriber sub = n.subscribe("/cmd_vel", 10, cmd_vel_callback);
318  ros::Publisher md49_encoders_pub = n.advertise<custom_messages::md49_encoders>("md49_encoders",10);
319  ros::Publisher md49_data_pub = n.advertise<custom_messages::md49_data>("md49_data",10);
320  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
321  n.param<std::string>("serialport/name", serialport, "/dev/ttyS0"); // Get serialportname from ROS Parameter sevice, default is ttyS0 (pcDuinos GPIO UART)
322  n.param("serialport/bps", serialport_bps, 38400); // Get serialport bps from ROS Parameter sevice, default is 38400Bps
323  n.param("md49/mode", initial_md49_mode, 0); // Get MD49 Mode from ROS Parameter sevice, default is Mode=0
324  n.param("md49/acceleration", initial_md49_acceleration, 5); // Get MD49 Acceleration from ROS Parameter sevice, default is Acceleration=0
325  n.param("md49/regulator", initial_md49_regulator, true); // Get MD49 Regulator from ROS Parameter sevice, default is Regulator=ON
326  n.param("md49/timeout", initial_md49_timeout, true); // Get MD49 Timeout from ROS Parameter sevice, default is Timeout=ON
327  n.param("md49/speed_l", requested_speed_l, 128); // Get MD49 speed_l from ROS Parameter sevice, default is spee_l=128
328  n.param("md49/speed_r", requested_speed_r, 128); // Get MD49 speed_r from ROS Parameter sevice, default is spee_r=128
329  ROS_INFO("base_controller: base_controller running...");
330  // *******************
331  // * Open serialport *
332  // *******************
333  try{ device.open(serialport.c_str(), serialport_bps); }
334  catch(cereal::Exception& e)
335  {
336  ROS_FATAL("base_controller: Failed to open serialport %s!",serialport.c_str());
337  ROS_BREAK();
338  }
339  ROS_INFO("base_controller: Opened Serialport at %s with %i bps.",serialport.c_str(),serialport_bps);
340  // ***************************************************************************************
341  // * Generate instance mymd49 of class md49 and set initial settings through constructor *
342  // ***************************************************************************************
343  md49 mymd49(requested_speed_l,requested_speed_r,initial_md49_mode,initial_md49_acceleration,initial_md49_timeout,initial_md49_regulator);
344  // ************
345  // * Mainloop *
346  // ************
347  while(n.ok())
348  {
349  // set speed on MD49 via UART as set through /cmd_vel if speed_l or speed_r changed since last cycle
350  if ((requested_speed_l != actual_speed_l) || (requested_speed_r != actual_speed_r)){
351  mymd49.set_speed(requested_speed_l,requested_speed_r);
352  }
353  // Read encoder- data from MD49 via UART and publish encoder values as read to topic /md49_encoders
354  mymd49.get_encoders();
355  md49_encoders_pub.publish(md49_encoders);
356  // Read other- data from MD49 via UART and publish MD49 data as read to topic /md49_data
357  md49_data.speed_l=mymd49.get_speed_l();
358  md49_data.speed_r=mymd49.get_speed_r();
359  md49_data.volts=mymd49.get_volts();
360  md49_data.current_l=mymd49.get_current_l();
361  md49_data.current_r=mymd49.get_current_r();
362  md49_data.acceleration=mymd49.get_acceleration();
363  md49_data.mode=mymd49.get_mode();
364  md49_data.error=mymd49.get_error();
365  md49_data_pub.publish(md49_data);
366  // Loop
367  ros::spinOnce();
368  loop_rate.sleep();
369  }// end.mainloop
370  return 1;
371 } // end.main
